content.heroIntro: Discover GOMERA STAR, an exceptional new development by GUEMAR in Aguas Nuevas, Torrevieja. This prestigious project offers a carefully curated selection of modern villas, apartments, and penthouses designed for discerning buyers seeking the Costa Blanca lifestyle. With prices starting from just €274,900, GOMERA STAR delivers outstanding value without compromising on quality or location. Each property features 2-3 bedrooms, 2-3 bathrooms, and contemporary finishes across built sizes of 77-115m², perfect for families, investors, or those seeking a Mediterranean retreat. Scheduled for completion on June 1st, 2026, GOMERA STAR represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Spain's most vibrant coastal communities. GUEMAR's proven track record ensures superior construction standards and reliable delivery, while Torrevieja's thriving expat community—the largest in Spain—welcomes English speakers with open arms and comprehensive English-language services throughout the town.

locationSection.intro: Aguas Nuevas in Torrevieja is a thriving residential enclave that has become synonymous with Costa Blanca living at its finest. Located in the heart of Spain's largest expat community, this strategic neighborhood combines authentic Spanish charm with modern amenities and international convenience. Aguas Nuevas benefits from excellent connectivity to Torrevieja's vibrant town center, pristine beaches, and world-class golf courses. The area is characterized by well-established residential communities, quality shopping facilities, and comprehensive healthcare services including the renowned Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja. With the iconic Playa del Cura just minutes away and multiple championship golf courses within easy reach, Aguas Nuevas offers the perfect balance of peaceful living and active leisure. Property values in Torrevieja have appreciated 8% year-on-year, making this an increasingly attractive investment destination for both lifestyle buyers and portfolio investors.
